rooms.description: A spacious area designed for eco-friendly living with large windows to maximize natural lighting; oriented as per Vastu guidelines for energy flow.
A private suite with an ensuite bathroom; positioned in the north-western part of the house to harness positive energy according to Vastu principles.
Dedicated guest room located on the east side, ensuring ample sunlight and ventilation as per Vastu norms.
A quiet area for work or study, placed in a corner that receives diffused natural light while maintaining privacy.
An eco-friendly gym with sustainable materials and efficient ventilation; integrated into the ground floor design to allow for easy access and energy efficiency.

openings.description: Entry portal designed with natural stone and eco-friendly materials; oriented to invite positive energy.
Access door for the two-car garage, ensuring smooth vehicle flow and adherence to local building codes.
Doorway to access the swimming pool area; designed with safety and Vastu principles in mind.
